SEARCH
Package controller.interfaces

Interface DoctorAppointmentController

All Superinterfaces:
AppointmentController
All Known Implementing Classes:
DoctorAppointmentControllerImpl
public interface DoctorAppointmentController extends AppointmentController
Interface for managing appointment-related operations specific to doctors. This interface extends AppointmentController and provides additional methods tailored to doctors' needs, such as:
  • Retrieving a doctor's appointments.
  • Handling appointment requests.
  • Adding available time slots for appointments.
  • Retrieving upcoming appointments for a doctor.

  • Method Details

    • getDoctorAppointments

      List<Appointment> getDoctorAppointments(String doctorId)
      Retrieves all appointments associated with a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects representing the doctor's appointments.

    • getAppointmentRequests

      List<Appointment> getAppointmentRequests(String doctorId)
      Retrieves appointment requests for a specific doctor. Appointment requests are those awaiting the doctor's approval or response.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects representing the appointment requests.

    • getDoctorUpcomingAppointments

      List<Appointment> getDoctorUpcomingAppointments(String doctorId)
      Retrieves upcoming appointments for a specific doctor. Upcoming appointments are those scheduled in the future that have not been canceled or completed.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects representing the upcoming appointments.

    • addDoctorSlots

      boolean addDoctorSlots(String doctorId, List<LocalDateTime> slots)
      Adds new time slots to a doctor's availability for appointments.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      slots - A list of LocalDateTime objects representing the new available time slots.
      Returns:
      true if the slots were successfully added, false otherwise.

    • handleAppointmentRequest

      boolean handleAppointmentRequest(String appointmentId, boolean accept)
      Handles an appointment request by accepting or declining it.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment to be handled.
      accept - true to accept the request, false to decline it.
      Returns:
      true if the request was successfully handled, false otherwise.
